name: eventplanner
description: Arjun Rashalogni Evan Giampaoli Cleveland Plonsey

scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && npm run test"  "cd server && npm run test"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev"  "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd client && npm run format"  "cd server && npm run format"
scripts.format:check: concurrently "cd client && npm run format:check"  "cd server && npm run format:check"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint"  "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:check: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint:check"  "cd server && npm run lint:check"
